bibl.title: A Skeleton from the Michigan Karanis Excavation.
Karanis Revealed. Discovering the Past and Present of a Michigan Excavation in Egypt

bibl.note: Burial 1924.100. Skeleton of an adult female, aged between 55 and 60 years.
bibl.seg: Thomas Landvatter, A Skeleton from the Michigan Karanis Excavation.

Terry G. Wilfong (ed.), with the assistance of Andrew W.S. Ferrara, Karanis Revealed. Discovering the Past and Present of a Michigan Excavation in Egypt = Kelsey Museum Publication 7 (Ann Arbor, 2014) pp. 141-142, fig. 48.
Burial 1924.100. Skeleton of an adult female, aged between 55 and 60 years.
